name: Pistol
abilityText: Shoots all bullets remaining at once, like a shotgun

name: Sword
attackText: Cut em', cut em, cut em', CUT EM''...
abilityText: Summon an apocaliptic rain of swords and steel

name: Torch
abilityText: Heal your wounds at the warmth of the fireplace

name: Laser Shades
abilityText: Shoot a laser orb to burn them all away

name: Bow
attackText: Pull the bow, aim, and kill

name: Tick
abilityText: Conjure a blinding light that confuses enemies around you

name: Spear
attackText: Stick them with the pointy thingaling
abilityText: Throw the spear and pierce your enemies

name: SMG
attackText: Use this fast minigun, honor its name
abilityText: Turn on automode, and spray n' pray'

name: Assault Rifle
abilityText: Throw a grenade to finish with everyone that opposes you

name: Lightbeam
attackText: These bullets of pure light will obliterate your enemies to a crisp
abilityText: Use the remaining energy on the weapon to creat a ginormous explosion

name: Riot Shield
attackText: Squash thos midgets with force of steel
abilityText: Place the shield and cover behind, it will protect you

name: Cheat Gun
attackText: Bullets from this advance war machine will follow the nearest enemy
abilityText: You get invulneravility for a time, make use of it

name: Ritual Axe
attackText: Absorb the souls of your enemies. They won't need them anymore...
abilityText: Consume the souls collected to heal your wounds

name: Laser Katana
attackText: Dash through your enemies with this weapon from 2042 Japan
abilityText: Surrender the weapon to create electric slashes that travel slowly. Face the light!
